I have the following T206's and T213-2 for sale right now:

T206 Dougherty, Chicago Amer. - Poor condition w/ creases and very nice registration. Piedmont 150 fact. 25......$15.00

T206 Hooker, Lynchburg - Southern Leaguer. Poor. Piedmont 350 Fact.25.......................................................$35.00

T213-2 Coupon Type 2 -  Ford, Buffalo Federal League. Poor.  Dark staining on reverse, with paperloss..................$15.00

Also the following photo:

Very interesting early 20th century photo of an unidentified player.  Team name Oak Grove on the jersey with some foliage in the background (not very noticeable in the scans).....................$40.00

All items can be seen on my website.  Link fixed

Please email me with any questions at andyhuntoon@gmail.com 

First email stating "I'll take it" takes precedent over posts.
 

Thanks,

Andy
